episodes.synopsis: As Capt. Denninger and the crew of the spacecraft Ascension celebrate the midway point of their 100-year mission, a murder disrupts the festivities.
episodes.title: Chapter One, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Gault finds notebook writings referring to an insurrection. A gun found in Stokes's headquarters incriminates him in Lorelei's murder.
episodes.title: Chapter One, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An outside security consultant is assigned to investigate the murder. A flashback shows Ophelia, 20 years prior, saving Gault from a fire on Deck 23.
episodes.title: Chapter Two, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Christa refuses to submit to the mandatory inoculations. To prove the shots are safe, Ophelia takes one herself and winds up in a coma.
episodes.title: Chapter Two, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Councilman Rose tries to take over the captain’s position. Stokes gets Samantha to help him escape and learns the truth about the Ascension.
episodes.title: Chapter Three, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The energy surge Christa generated indicates that the Ascension experiment is working. Director Warren tries to bring her out, but things go awry.
episodes.title: Chapter Three, Part 2

video.title: Ascension
video.synopsis: Half a century after its 1963 launch, a U.S. spacecraft is rocked by a murder that threatens to expose secrets about the expedition's true purpose.
